pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Multiscale Spatial Analysis // Tools for the multiscale spatial analysis of multivariate data. Several methods are based on the use of a spatial weighting matrix and its eigenvector decomposition (Moran's Eigenvectors Maps, MEM). Several approaches are described in the review Dray et al (2012) doi:10.1890/11-1183.1.
